name: San Diego Seaplanes
about: San Diego Seaplanes, with over 30 years of experience in commercial seaplane operations, offers exceptional flight instruction and tours. Our pilots, led by Captain Michael Steel, boast a minimum of 4,000 flight hours and 20 years of commercial seaplane experience, maintaining a perfect safety record. Captain Steel, a Dartmouth College graduate, has flown in numerous movie and TV productions and designed the Waterworld Seaplane. Our team, including Business Manager Andrea Steel, ensures smooth daily operations and coordinates events like the "Support Our Troops â€“ FREE flights for Military Families" project. We provide comprehensive flight training, including ground school and flight instruction, with a focus on safety and adventure. Join us for a thrilling seaplane experience that combines the freedom of flight with the excitement of water take-offs and landings.
